name: Tabs
description: A component for organizing content into tabbed sections
useWhen: Content can be organized into distinct sections
User needs to switch between related views
Space is limited and content should be shown one section at a time
Sections are at the same level of hierarchy
dontUseWhen: All content should be visible at once (use Accordion)
Navigation is between different pages (use Navigation)

defaultValue.description: Default active tab for uncontrolled usage

activationMode.description: When to activate tabs (on focus or on click)

examples.name: Vertical
examples.code:
<Tabs.Root defaultValue="tab1" orientation="vertical">
  <Tabs.List>
    <Tabs.Trigger value="tab1">Tab 1</Tabs.Trigger>
    <Tabs.Trigger value="tab2">Tab 2</Tabs.Trigger>
  </Tabs.List>
  <Tabs.Content value="tab1">Content 1</Tabs.Content>
  <Tabs.Content value="tab2">Content 2</Tabs.Content>
</Tabs.Root>

accessibility.screenReader: Announces tab state and associated panel
